Articles.Content:

pls someone give me a link? ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

For KSP v 0.90

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-27T15:56:55Z" title="03/27/2015 03:56  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 27, 2015</time> by CrAzY GeNiUs**

Can you be more specific? 

(And I think you'd want to post this at the "Gameplay Questions and Tutorials". ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif))
I believe this is a request for mod help, and so, moved. If not, we can move it again. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
You could try doing a search in the add-ons section?

sorry guys. I was in a hurry and I was not looking where I announced the publication.

note i am Serbian and sorry for bad English.

I found a mod, btw i tnx for help
